projects.title: Iconic Aesthetics
projects.description: Complete business technology solution including custom website with integrated booking system, Point of Sale implementation, business material design, and digital marketing.

modalContent.subtitle: Complete business technology solution for a beauty clinic.
modalContent.detailedDescription: Iconic Aesthetics needed a comprehensive technology solution to streamline their operations and enhance customer experience. We delivered a custom-designed website with an integrated booking system, implemented a Square Point of Sale system, created branded business materials, and set up their office technology infrastructure.
projectDetails: Custom website design with mobile-first approach
Online booking and appointment management system
Square POS system implementation with inventory management
Customer database and loyalty program setup
Business card and marketing material design
Staff training and ongoing technical support
modalContent.results: Since implementing our technology solutions, Iconic Aesthetics has seen a 40% increase in online bookings and significantly improved their customer management process. The integrated POS system has streamlined their payment processing and inventory management.

projects.title: East Coast Realty by Zarina
projects.description: Comprehensive technology solution for a real estate firm, including modern website, complete office setup with network configuration, and business material design.
features: Real Estate Website with MLS Integration

modalContent.subtitle: Technology solution for a real estate firm.
modalContent.detailedDescription: East Coast Realty needed a modern digital presence and comprehensive office technology setup. We delivered a complete solution that included a professional website with property listings, office network infrastructure, and custom marketing materials.
projectDetails: Real estate website with property search functionality
MLS integration for automatic property listings
Custom business cards and marketing materials
modalContent.results: The technology solutions have helped East Coast Realty establish a strong online presence and streamline their operations. Their new systems have improved property management efficiency and enhanced the client experience.

projects.title: Cohen & Associates
projects.description: Technology solution for a tax accounting firm featuring secure document handling, client portal integration, complete office setup, and network security implementation.

modalContent.subtitle: Secure technology solution for tax and accounting services.
modalContent.detailedDescription: Cohen & Associates required a secure and professional technology infrastructure for their accounting firm. We implemented a comprehensive solution that includes a secure website with client portal, document management system, and office network with enhanced security measures.
projectDetails: Professional website with secure client portal
Data backup and disaster recovery systems
Tax resource library and client education section
modalContent.results: The implemented solutions have significantly enhanced client data security while improving operational efficiency. Clients now benefit from secure document sharing and a streamlined experience when working with the firm.

projects.title: Doug Uhlig Psychological Services
projects.description: Healthcare technology solution with appointment scheduling, HIPAA-compliant systems, Apple device management, and electronic record integration.

modalContent.subtitle: HIPAA-compliant technology solution for a psychology practice.
modalContent.detailedDescription: Doug Uhlig Psychological Services needed a HIPAA-compliant technology solution for their practice. We delivered a secure website with appointment scheduling, integrated Apple devices for practice management, and implemented secure systems for patient records.
projectDetails: HIPAA-compliant website with secure appointment scheduling
Secure backup and disaster recovery solutions
modalContent.results: The practice now benefits from streamlined operations while maintaining the highest levels of patient data security and confidentiality, allowing them to focus more on patient care and less on administrative tasks.

projects.title: S-Cream
projects.description: Complete technology solution for an ice cream shop featuring online ordering, menu management, POS system implementation, and branded materials design.

modalContent.subtitle: Comprehensive technology solution for an ice cream shop.
modalContent.detailedDescription: S-Cream required a complete technology ecosystem for their new ice cream shop. We implemented a solution that included an e-commerce website with online ordering, digital menu system, POS integration, and branded materials design.
projectDetails: E-commerce website with online ordering functionality
Digital menu system with real-time updates
Point of Sale system with inventory management
Brand identity package including logo and marketing materials
Social media integration and management tools
modalContent.results: The technology solutions have helped S-Cream establish a strong market presence with 30% of their sales now coming through online orders. Their integrated systems have improved efficiency and customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Century One Management Services
projects.description: Integrated property management technology solution with tenant portal, maintenance request system, office network implementation, and security solutions.

modalContent.subtitle: Property management technology solution.
modalContent.detailedDescription: Century One Management Services needed a comprehensive property management technology solution. We delivered a complete system including a tenant portal, maintenance request tracking, office network implementation, and security infrastructure.
projectDetails: Property management portal with tenant accounts
modalContent.results: The implemented solution has significantly improved tenant satisfaction with easier communication and payment processing. Management efficiency has increased with automated maintenance tracking and reporting.
